entries.name: BOLD
entries.description: You trust your capabilities to the point that you are not easily daunted, readily placing yourself in danger.

entries.name: CUNNING
entries.description: Your wit is sharp, and you are ready to use it to your advantage.

entries.name: EAGER
entries.description: You are filled with excitement and impatience when an endeavour piques your interest.

entries.name: FAITHFUL
entries.description: You are steadfastly devoted to those ideals or individuals you have chosen to follow, and your unwavering loyalty often supports you in your deeds.

entries.name: FAIR
entries.description: You are considered attractive by most people, even by those not belonging to your folk.

entries.name: FAIR-SPOKEN
entries.description: Your speech and manners are naturally pleasant and respectful, and your words rarely provoke offense.

entries.name: FIERCE
entries.description: When provoked, or when you deem it necessary, you may allow your savage side to emerge.

entries.name: GENEROUS
entries.description: You give with open hands and heart, always mindful of the needs of others.

entries.name: HONOURABLE
entries.description: You believe in acting fairly and doing what is morally right.

entries.name: INQUISITIVE
entries.description: Your curious nature is easily aroused, often by what is often not your concern. The positive side is that you are not easily deceived by appearances.

entries.name: KEEN-EYED
entries.description: The keenness of your eyesight surpasses that of most folk.

entries.name: LORDLY
entries.description: Your dignified bearing arouses feelings of reverence and respect in onlookers.

entries.name: MERRY
entries.description: Your spirit is not easily discouraged, and you can find light in the darkest of shadows.

entries.name: PATIENT
entries.description: You are slow to lose your temper and can suffer fools, delays, or even hardship without complaint.

entries.name: PROUD
entries.description: You hold your feats and achievements, or those of your people, in high esteem.

entries.name: RUSTIC
entries.description: Your ways are simple, some might say even uncouth, but you know that not all that is gold does necessarily glitter.

entries.name: SECRETIVE
entries.description: You do not easily share your thoughts and prefer to conceal your intentions from the eyes of others, especially outsiders to your folk.

entries.name: STERN
entries.description: You possess a severe nature and express it in your behaviour, body language, and speech.

entries.name: SUBTLE
entries.description: You may not be a Wizard, but often the ways you choose to achieve your goals are crafty, if not devious.

entries.name: SWIFT
entries.description: You move swiftly and are quick to take action.

entries.name: TALL
entries.description: You tower above most of your folk.

entries.name: TRUE-HEARTED
entries.description: You are sincere, and your words and actions show your honest intentions.

entries.name: WARY
entries.description: You are always mindful of your surroundings and observant of the speech and behaviour of strangers.

entries.name: WILFUL
entries.description: You are firm in temperament and belief, and
